title: How do I build for different Android stores?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I am unable to change the Store that Unity IAP targets.
  • I would like to switch (for example) from Google Play to Amazon Appstore?

sections.title: Cause
content: You wish to use the correct app store when using the IAP service within your game.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Manually set the Android store (aka “Android Flavor”) using the Window > Unity IAP > Android > Target Amazon menu item.
